languages.text: "Уничтожить золотую жилу? Шерин, в своем ли уме этот бравый ашмаг?! Мы обязаны начать разработку этого чудесного минерала! Во имя Империума, конечно..."
"Destroy the goldmine? Has the iron-jawed ashmag lost his mind, shereen? We've got to start harvesting this wonderful mineral! In the name of the Imperium, obviously..."
languages.original_text: "Уничтожить золотую жилу? Шерин, в своем ли уме этот бравый ашмаг?! Мы обязаны начать разработку этого чудесного минерала! Во имя Империума, конечно..."

languages.text: “摧毁这无价的宝藏？亲爱的，这个长着铁下巴的坏种是不是疯了？我们必须立刻开采这种奇妙的矿物！当然，是以帝国的名义……”
languages.original_text: "Destroy the goldmine? Has the iron-jawed ashmag lost his mind, shereen? We've got to start harvesting this wonderful mineral! In the name of the Imperium, obviously..."

traits.locale_text: “摧毁这无价的宝藏？亲爱的，这个长着铁下巴的坏种是不是疯了？我们必须立刻开采这种奇妙的矿物！当然，是以帝国的名义……”

languages.text: 「宝の山を破壊するの？シェリーン、鉄の顎を持つアッシュマグは気がおかしくなったの？この素晴らしい鉱物を収集し始めなくちゃ！もちろん、帝国の名において…」
languages.original_text: "Destroy the goldmine? Has the iron-jawed ashmag lost his mind, shereen? We've got to start harvesting this wonderful mineral! In the name of the Imperium, obviously..."

traits.locale_text: 「宝の山を破壊するの？シェリーン、鉄の顎を持つアッシュマグは気がおかしくなったの？この素晴らしい鉱物を収集し始めなくちゃ！もちろん、帝国の名において…」

languages.text: «¿Destruir esta mina de oro? ¿Es que ese ashmag de mandíbula cuadrada ha perdido el juicio, shereen? ¡Lo que hay que hacer es empezar a extraer ese mineral prodigioso! En nombre del Imperium, claro está...».
languages.original_text: "Destroy the goldmine? Has the iron-jawed ashmag lost his mind, shereen? We've got to start harvesting this wonderful mineral! In the name of the Imperium, obviously..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Destruir esta mina de oro? ¿Es que ese ashmag de mandíbula cuadrada ha perdido el juicio, shereen? ¡Lo que hay que hacer es empezar a extraer ese mineral prodigioso! En nombre del Imperium, claro está...».

languages.text: "Altın madenini yok etmek mi? Bu demir çeneli külboğaz, aklını yitirmiş şirinim! Bu muhteşem madeni çıkarmaya başlamalıyız! İmparatorluk adına tabii ki..."
languages.original_text: "Destroy the goldmine? Has the iron-jawed ashmag lost his mind, shereen? We've got to start harvesting this wonderful mineral! In the name of the Imperium, obviously..."

traits.locale_text: "Altın madenini yok etmek mi? Bu demir çeneli külboğaz, aklını yitirmiş şirinim! Bu muhteşem madeni çıkarmaya başlamalıyız! İmparatorluk adına tabii ki..."

languages.text: « Détruire la mine d'or ? L'ashmag à la mâchoire d'acier a-t-il perdu la raison, shereen ? Nous devons commencer à exploiter ce merveilleux minerai ! Au nom de l'Imperium, évidemment... »
languages.original_text: "Destroy the goldmine? Has the iron-jawed ashmag lost his mind, shereen? We've got to start harvesting this wonderful mineral! In the name of the Imperium, obviously..."

traits.locale_text: « Détruire la mine d'or ? L'ashmag à la mâchoire d'acier a-t-il perdu la raison, shereen ? Nous devons commencer à exploiter ce merveilleux minerai ! Au nom de l'Imperium, évidemment... »

languages.text: "Die Goldmine zerstören? Hat der Eisenkiefer-Ashmag den Verstand verloren, Shereen? Wir müssen dieses wunderbare Mineral abbauen! Im Namen des Imperiums, versteht sich ..."
languages.original_text: "Destroy the goldmine? Has the iron-jawed ashmag lost his mind, shereen? We've got to start harvesting this wonderful mineral! In the name of the Imperium, obviously..."
